Title: Join the Battle!
Description:
I received an urgent message from Sergeant Willem. Turns out that the Blackrock orcs have hired goblin assassins. They ambushed our battalion behind the abbey. Willem has asked me to send him a hero. You have to go help them, $n!

Find Sergeant Willem north of the abbey at the command tent. Go!
ObjectivesText: Report to Sergeant Willem behind Northshire Abbey in Elwynn Forest.
PortraitGiverText: Sergeant Willem can be found at the command tent behind Northshire Abbey.
RewardText: It's true, we were ambushed. I don't dare send any more soldiers out there and risk losing them too. I need a volunteer. Someone willing to risk their life!
